body:
> attach agent

It provides limited features, and it is not matching SkyWalking's requirement.
This commit makes TraceIgnoreExtendService overrides SamplingService, so sample count or trace prefix only pick one?

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: hidden/net/bytebuddy/matcher/ElementMatcher
	at org.apache.skywalking.apm.plugin.scf.test.TestInstrumentation.getInstanceMethodsInterceptPoints(TestInstrumentation.java:60)

We shaded those classes.
We are open to his feature.
@JaredTan95  I want to merge slack webhook function and normal webhook into Single webhook , which can support template(velocity engine) to dynamic generate the Post Resquest body, what do you think?
Search issue. This is duplicated.

Are those highly compatible? Usually, we expect API integration could be separated. Because it is easier to maintain, enhance, and bug fix.

One user may know nothing about others.
BTW, all differences of any HTTP APIs are URI and HTTP body. 🤪 We can't say they are all similar and be replaced by the template.

> Are those highly compatible? Usually, we expect API integration could be separated. Because it is easier to maintain, enhance, and bug fix.
> 
> One user may know nothing about others.
I think there are two solutions todo this.
1. break change.  merge slack and webhook to uniform one like belows: 

```
  webhooks:
       -
       url: http://xxx
       template: "sss"
       headers: ""
       -
       url: http://xxx
       template: "sss"
       headers: ""
        
```

2. Enhance slactHooks to support with template engine,  not change the webhooks config

what do you think?

> BTW, all differences of any HTTP APIs are URI and HTTP body. 🤪 We can't say they are all similar and be replaced by the template.

For the webhook providers, I checked dingtalk, wechat they are both similar with slack
I just want the webhook to be more general, refer to [zendesk webhook](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/204890268-Creating-webhooks-with-the-HTTP-target#topic_yf1_fs5_tr)

You add a thing called template, then what the difference of putting this in alarm config? Less configuration seems easier for user. Basically, I can't see much difference. 
This is my point.
Please install Lombok plugin in your IDEA and enable annotation processor
I know your meaning, we have freemarker in the oap lib. I am talking from design principle perspective.
From your title and stack trace, I can't see anything that is related to SkyWalking, please provide more context about what you want to ask
dashboard: Issue occurs ( data missing) in the end though the data is correct at the beginning

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10267892/92746125-8e48fe80-f3b5-11ea-86c6-09dcd4aab433.png)

### agent log：

You are sending http data to grpc port.
i have installed Lombok plugin  and enable annotation processor， but not useful ，see ![](http://image.nianlun.tech/2020/09/10/9c195acf870d0d3e560b88fee52af499.jpg)

> io.netty.handler.codec.http2.Http2Exception: Unexpected HTTP/1.x request: GET /


this is the key, Grpc is based on http/2 , but you just tried to communicate with http/1.x
一开始用容器启动了skywalking-ui以及oap，也启动了应用，界面展示都正常，后来在测试环境运行了几个星期，再去看就没数据了。
please don't submit duplicate issue.
然后重启skywalking-ui以及oap都无效，业务应用重启也无效。业务应用采用的springcloud技术，应用容器采用的undertow和netty。
skywalking 使用的mysql作为数据源。

1. installing a plugin requires the IDEA to restart to take effect
2. make sure to import the project as maven project, and the maven dependencies are correctly refreshed
You are setting wrong ports. There is nothing about rebooting.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10267892/92748993-44ade300-f3b8-11ea-990e-8ac0a5cfa185.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10267892/92749698-f0efc980-f3b8-11ea-86e8-cd80552dd30d.png)

> You are setting wrong ports. There is nothing about rebooting.

Compatible undertow？

Undertow has nothing related to this. You are misunderstanding the whole thing. 
First, this is about the connection between agent and oap. You are saying something about agent plugin.

> Undertow has nothing related to this. You are misunderstanding the whole thing.
> First, this is about the connection between agent and oap. You are saying something about agent plugin.

一开始dashboard都是有数据的，也都是好的，后来运行一段时间后，环境没变的情况下就没数据了
Please keep the discussion in English. I answered your question based on the logs you provided. I can not tell what is really happening on your private env. But the logs are clear.
now resolved, thanks!
You should set TraceId into ServerWebExchange in the agent, so that you will get TraceId from ServerWebExchange attribute.

Modify spring-webflux agent like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26428832/92846241-722b7880-f41a-11ea-8d2e-4763e400c526.png)

in your SCG project:
String TraceId = serverWebExchange.getAttribute("global.trace.id");
We have no plan to set trace id in user codes to avoid conflict.

> We have no plan to set trace id in user codes to avoid conflict.

But, in async scenario, There is no way to get TraceId of per request, must relate to Context.
It should relate to context, which relating to it is the question.
The concern of this change is, if user use the same key, it breaks. And this provide the different API to end users, it is confused to users.
Why not give the authority to the user to decide the key name by config file instead of providing API?

Bit still two API. We never did this before. Because  one day, you could ask for tag, log or new span in the context. 
We have to fix the thing in right theory, rather than keep breaking things.
So...Back to the beginning, How to get TraceId correcttly in SCG :)

> > attach agent
> 
> It provides limited features, and it is not matching SkyWalking's requirement.

Ok,your mean is monitor agent.conf file change? and call ServiceManager.shutdonw ->initializeCoreConfig->ServiceManager.boot ，Now follow this procedure to refresh the configuration successfully。 e ok?
No, I think in agent side, we can just dynamic change Config  and Plugin related Config
@Lumia001 We explained this, and Dubbo should have fixed this. Check the linked commit id
If it is ignored, why we should generate trace id? That seems an unreasonable resource cost.
You set period to 1, which could make this happens. Period maps to the window for alarm rule check, at least set 2 or 3.
Don't ask us to explain the logic. The codes are there. Please read them.
I think this is a bug, could you send a pull request to fix the template? And please keep all things in English.
That commit is only 16 days ago. I doubt whether it is in your release.

If so, try removing it the next time my upgrade.

Thank your response a lot.
It used to be in either, not both. This is fixing other bugs. `TraceIgnoreExtendService` technically is a sampling mechanism, but base on rules.
@ascrutae is doing some tests, that is why this PR is assigned to him.

> Ok,your mean is monitor agent.conf file change?

No, we don't recommend doing this. 

>  I think in agent side, we can just dynamic change Config and Plugin related Config

Yes, I prefer this way.

> If it is ignored, why we should generate trace id? That seems an unreasonable resource cost.

No trace id how to combine trace with log？
This is our case. We makes trace could show logs, it makes tracing question be quick and clear.

I understand what's your means.And we are already cherry-picked this commit to our 8.1.0 to solve conflict, I mean for functionaly, filter trace by operation name and limit by count should be both.
I'm trying write a new SamplingService to override it, but I still hope these two function could be original.
Please use English. And the name of entities has been defined through OAL or in the codes.
Please use the latest version.

> I'm trying write a new SamplingService to override it, but I still hope these two function could be original.

You could simply contribute this to the ignore plugin, which could just call `super#doSampling`. We are welcome to contribute to this feature.

> No trace id how to combine trace with log？

But you ignore the trace, why you require SkyWalking to resolve this issue?

Our supported list doesn't include this version. https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/setup/service-agent/java-agent/Supported-list.md

The contribution is welcome.

Sry this is a bad example. My point is use trace id to string log together are important.

Keep tracing but not upload will be good, we can't trace every(performance or storage reasons), but we still need trace id.
I still think you should open backend sampling, rather than asking this strange feature, as you are only concerned about the storage performance.
Alright, maybe it's not strange, we used Arms before skywalking, Arms print traceId all the time even if some of them out of sample. So we can use its traceId instead ours.
ARMS is not standard, and they did many things to break the performance and stability. SkyWalking chooses the features very carefully.
A commercial product and cloud service is not a reason which we should or should not do. The open-source project makes the decision from a tech perspective.
please assgin to me.

# [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/apache/skywalking/pull/5474?src=pr&el=h1) Report

@kezhenxu94 We had a discussion here, https://github.com/apache/skywalking/issues/5460. Please take a look.

From my personal preference, I don't like the integration API in the same method. Because they belong to different enterprises. They definitely will not consider others' API, if they are going to upgrade one day. 
Such as, they could request a header or different authentication way.
If one day, something is not incompatible, we have to add strange `if/else`.
A minor different of slack vs wechat(dingtalk) is  slack support batch message,  wechat and dingtalk only support single message

Also, we should add an optional config for `rule`, named `onlyAsGroupCondition`(true/false, default false). Once this is added, meaning, even the alarm rule checking returns true, it would not trigger the notification. At the same time, the `onlyAsGroupCondition=false`(default) rule still could be as a condition.

NOTE, group doesn't mean we set the alarm rule for different entities, we just don't check them in the setup/initial stages. But in the runtime, only the same entity(same scope, id0, and id1) in the `AlarmMessage` with required multiple rules(expression) triggered, determine the final notification.
Sounds good to me, another possible name of the new config section may be called `composite-rules` because we are now having `rules`
